00002 class OsimoTheme extends OsimoModule{
00003  public $page_type;
00004  protected $theme,$title;

00006  private $css,$js;

00009  function OsimoTheme($options=false){
00010   parent::OsimoModule();
00011   $this->defaults = array(
00012    "theme"=>"default",
00013    "title"=>"Osimo Forum System"
00014   );
00015   
00016   $this->parseOptions($options);
00017   $this->init();
00018  }
00019  
00020  private function init(){
00021   $this->css = array();
00022   $this->js = array();
00023   
00024   if(isset(get('osimo')->config['current_theme'])){
00025    $this->theme = get('osimo')->config['current_theme'];
00026   }
00027   
00028   $this->theme_path = ABS_THEMES.$this->theme.'/';
00029   define('ABS_THEME',$this->theme_path);
00030   define('URL_THEME',URL_THEMES.$this->theme.'/');
00031   
00032   $this->add_javascript(URL_JS.'jquery/jquery.js',false);
00033   $this->add_javascript(URL_JS.'jquery/jquery-ui.js',false);
00034   $this->add_javascript(URL_JS.'osimo_editor/osimo_editor.js',false);
00035   if(!get('debug')->disabled()){
00036    $this->add_javascript(URL_JS.'OsimoDebug.js',false);
00037   }
00038   $this->add_javascript(URL_JS.'OsimoJS.js',false);
00039   $this->add_javascript(URL_JS.'OsimoAjax.js',false);
00040   $this->add_javascript(URL_JS.'OsimoUI.js',false);
00041   $this->add_javascript(URL_JS.'OsimoModal.js',false);
00042   
00043   $this->add_stylesheet(URL_DEFAULT_CONTENT.'css/styles.css',false);
00044   $this->add_stylesheet(URL_JS.'jquery/css/jquery-ui.css',false);
00045  }
00046  
00047  /* Theme loading functions */
00048  public function load($file){
00049   if(!is_file($this->theme_path."$file.php")){
00050    get('debug')->error("OsimoTheme: unable to locate file '$file'",__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,__FILE__,true);
00051    return false;
00052   }
00053   
00054   $this->auto_set_page_type($file);
00055   get('user')->update_user_stats();
00056   
00057   /* Autoload some data based on what page is being viewed */
00058   if($this->is_forum()){
00059    get('data')->load_forum_list();
00060    get('data')->load_thread_list();
00061   }
00062   elseif($this->is_thread()){
00063    get('data')->load_post_list();
00064   }
00065   
00066   $this->theme_file = $this->theme_path."/$file.php";
00067   include($this->theme_file);
00068  }
00069  
00070  public function include_theme_file($file,$echo=true){
00071   $osimo = $this->osimo;
00072   if(!is_file($this->theme_path.$file)){
00073    $this->osimo->debug->error("OsimoTheme: unable to locate file '$file'",__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,__FILE__,true);
00074    return false;
00075   }
00076   
00077   if($echo){
00078    include($this->theme_path.$file);
00079    return true;
00080   }
00081   else{
00082    return $this->include_contents($this->theme_path.$file);
00083   }
00084  }
00085

00092   get('debug')->scriptEnd();
00093   get('debug')->output_log();
00094  }

00104  public function get_title(){
00105   if(!isset($this->title)){
00106    $this->auto_title();

00112  public function auto_title(){
00113   if($this->page_type == 'index'){
00114    $this->set_title(OS_SITE_TITLE);
00115   }
00116   elseif($this->page_type == 'forum'){
00117    $this->set_title(OS_SITE_TITLE);
00118   }
00119   
00120   return $this;
00121  }

00131  public function add_stylesheet($url,$is_theme=true){
00132   if($is_theme){
00133    $url = URL_THEME.$url;
00134   }
00135   
00136   if(!in_array($url,$this->css)){
00137    $this->css[] = $url;
00138   }
00139   
00140   return $this;
00141  }
00142  
00143  public function add_javascript($url,$is_theme=true){

00145    $url = URL_THEME.$url;
00146   }
00147   
00148   if(!in_array($url,$this->js)){
00149    $this->js[] = $url;
00150   }
00151   
00152   return $this;

00155  public function get_header($echo = true){
00156   if(!$this->title){ $this->auto_title(); }
00157   
00158   $html = "<title>".$this->title." - Powered by Osimo</title>\n";
00159   $html .= "<meta http-equiv=\"x-ua-compatible\" content=\"IE=8\">\n";
00160   foreach($this->js as $js){
00161    $html .= "<script src=\"".$js."\"></script>\n";
00162   }
00163   foreach($this->css as $css){
00164    $html .= "<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"".$css."\" type=\"text/css\" media=\"screen\" />\n";
00165   }
00166   
00167   $html .= "
00168   <script type='text/javascript'>
00169    var osimo = new OsimoJS({
00170     'debug' : true
00171    });
00172   </script>";
00173 
00174   if($echo){ echo $html; }
00175   return $html;
00176  }

00178  public function set_page_type($type){
00179   $this->page_type = strtolower(str_replace(" ","_",$type));
00180  }
00181  
00182  private function auto_set_page_type($page){
00183   $page = strtolower(str_replace(" ","_",$page));
00184   $types = array(
00185    'index','forum',
00186    'thread','profile',
00187    'login'
00188   );
00189   
00190   if(in_array($page,$types)){
00191    $this->page_type = $page;
00192   }
00193   else{
00194    $this->page_type = 'other';
00195   }
00196  }

00223  public function is_ajax_capable($page_type=false){
00224   if($page_type == 'thread' || $this->page_type == 'thread'){
00225    return file_exists(ABS_THEME.'single_post.php');
00226   }
00227   elseif($page_type == 'forum' || $this->page_type == 'forum'){
00228    return file_exists(ABS_THEME.'single_thread.php');
00229   }
00230   
00231   return false;
00232  }

00284  public function preset_pagination($before=' ', $after=' ', $page_type=false, $page=false){
00285   if(!$page){
00286    isset(get('osimo')->GET['page']) ? $page = get('osimo')->GET['page'] : $page = 1;
00287   }
00288   
00289   $pages = $this->pagination_numbers($page);
00290   
00291   if(!$page_type && isset($this->page_type)){
00292    $page_type = $this->page_type;
00293   }
00294   
00295   $ajax = $this->is_ajax_capable($page_type);
00296   
00297   echo "<span class='OsimoPaginationWrap'>";
00298   if($pages['first']){
00299    echo '<span class="OsimoPagination" onclick="';
00300    if($ajax){
00301     echo 'osimo.loadPage(1)';
00302    }
00303    else{
00304     echo "window.location.href='".$page_type.".php?id=".get('osimo')->GET['id']."&page=1'";
00305    }
00306    echo '">First</span>'.$after.$before;
00307   }
00308   for($i = $pages['start']; $i <= $pages['end']; $i++){
00309    if($i != $pages['start']){ echo $before; }
00310    echo '<span class="OsimoPagination OsimoPaginationPage_'.$i;
00311    if($i == $page){ echo ' OsimoPaginationActivePage'; }
00312    echo '" onclick="';
00313    if($ajax){
00314     echo 'osimo.loadPage('.$i.')';
00315    }
00316    else{
00317     echo "window.location.href='".$page_type.".php?id=".get('osimo')->GET['id']."&page=$i'";
00318    }
00319    echo '">'.$i.'</span>';
00320    if($i != $pages['end']){ echo $after; }
00321   }
00322   if($pages['last']){ echo $after.$before.'<span class="OsimoPagination" onclick="osimo.loadPage('.$pages['num'].')">Last</span>'; }
00323   echo '</span>';
00324  }
00325  
00326  public function pagination_numbers($type=false,$id=false,$page=false){
00327   if(!$page){
00328    isset(get('osimo')->GET['page']) ? $page = get('osimo')->GET['page'] : $page = 1;
00329   }
00330   
00331   $pages['num'] = get('data')->num_pages($type,$id);
00332   
00333   if($pages['num'] <= 5){
00334    $pages['start'] = 1;
00335    $pages['end'] = $pages['num'];
00336    $pages['first'] = false; $pages['last'] = false;
00337   }
00338   else{
00339    if($page <= 3){
00340     $pages['start'] = 1;
00341     $pages['end'] = 5;
00342     $pages['first'] = false;
00343     $pages['last'] = true;
00344    }
00345    elseif($pages['num'] - $page <= 2){
00346     $pages['start'] = $pages['num'] - 5 + 1;
00347     $pages['end'] = $pages['num'];
00348     $pages['first'] = true;
00349     $pages['last'] = false;
00350    }
00351    else{
00352     $pages['start'] = $page - 2;
00353     $pages['end'] = $page + 2;
00354     $pages['first'] = true;
00355     $pages['last'] = true;
00356    }
00357   }
00358   
00359   return $pages;
00360  }
00361  
00362  public function include_contents($filename){
00363   $osimo = get('osimo'); //pull the osimo object into this scope just in case
00364 
00365   if (is_file($filename)) {
00366    ob_start();
00367    include $filename;
00368    $contents = ob_get_contents();
00369    ob_end_clean();
00370    return $contents;
00371      }
00372      
00373      return false;
00374  }
00375 }
